string-array.name: WrongRoman
string-array.item: I don\'t think Roman numerals are written like that
Did you write a keysmash? Because that\'s not a Roman numeral
Unfortunately, that\'s not a Roman numeral
That\'s not a Roman numeral. Let\'s say the result is 46

string-array.name: WrongInt
string-array.item: Such a weird number. Oh, wait, is not a number
Wrong number. Remember that Roman numerals only get to 3999!
Hint: You have to type an actual number to get a result
